mapper.select: SELECT A.HW_SEQ AS hwSeq, A.TITLE AS title, A.REG_DT AS regDt, CONCAT(B.FILE_PATH , B.FILE_NM) AS filePath, CONCAT(B.FILE_URL, B.FILE_NM ) AS fileUrl, CHECK_YN AS checkYn, REG_ID AS regId, DATE_FORMAT(reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regDt FROM BCU_HOMEWORK A, BCU_FILE B WHERE A.FILE_SEQ = B.FILE_SEQ ORDER BY HW_SEQ DESC

SELECT A.HW_SEQ AS hwSeq, A.TITLE AS title, A.REPLY AS reply, A.REG_DT AS regDt, CONCAT(B.FILE_PATH , B.FILE_NM) AS filePath, CONCAT(B.FILE_URL, B.FILE_NM ) AS fileUrl, CHECK_YN AS checkYn, REG_ID AS regId, DATE_FORMAT(reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regDt FROM BCU_HOMEWORK A, BCU_FILE B WHERE A.HW_SEQ = ${hwSeq} AND A.FILE_SEQ = B.FILE_SEQ
